titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the special diabetes programs for Type I diabetes and Indians under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 8/2/2012--Introduced. Amends the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize for FY2014-FY2018: (1) a research program for the prevention and cure of Type I diabetes, and (2) a program to provide services through Indian health facilities for the prevention and treatment of diabetes.
